title: Online Graduate Disaster Research and Statistics Education: Interactive Team-Teaching Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational statistics and research methodology understanding, along with basic disaster management concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasizes team-based collaboration and real-time feedback in a Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) environment. Applies a model where two instructors interact and lecture without geographical constraints.

learning_goals: Solve empirical research problems by applying intermediate statistical techniques (regression analysis, ANOVA, etc.) for disaster research data analysis
Structure research design processes through collaboration with peer learners and instructors in interactive team-teaching environments
Systematically perform data collection-analysis-interpretation processes by selecting disaster-related research topics through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
